name: Bullseye (itch) (bloxman10009)
description:
You have the arrows to move and a space bar to shoot, if you shoot near yourself you'll jump. If you will wish to restart while in the game press R and if you wish to go to the menu press M.

The arrow will be shot in the direction of the arrow drawing on the player.

There are spikes, enemies, and a boss that you will need to dodge and defeat. And also some tech pieces you will need to collect.

Good luck!
